modName: Akatsuki Deadric Armour inspired from Naruto Anime
summary: A re-texture of the Deadric Armor with Akatsuki texture, IT\'s A REPLACER
descriptionHtml:
I have only changed the texture of Deadric Armor so YOU NEED TO ALREADY HAVE A DEADRIC ARMOUR, IF YOU DON\'T, GET IT WITH THE CODES BELOW.
It looks a lil bit strange and confused, but I like it; if you like it too download and endorse, if you don\'t like,you don\'t have to leave a comment.
CODES TO GET NORMAL DEADRIC ARMOUR
Enter in the console ingame:
player.additem 0001396A 1- Boots 
player.additem 0001396B 1- Armor
player.additem 0001396C 1- Gauntlets
player.additem 0001396D 1- Helmet

Installation
You only have to unzip the file and copy \"Textures\" in your Data folder of Skyrim.
If you want to uninstall this you only have to delete the files you added before.
author: 1a1a
